thread.title: Carlton: You can easily make a case for Tech in the top half of the Big 12
thread.title_full: Carlton: You can easily make a case for Texas Tech in the top half of the Big 12 | Dallas Morning News

author: Chuck Carlton
title: Carlton: You can easily make a case for Tech in the top half of the Big 12
text:
SportsDay Big 12 insider Chuck Carlton recently hosted a chat to talk all things college football. Here are some of the highlights:
Question: How do you see Texas Tech finishing up the second half of the season?
Carlton: I said before the season began during a Fox Sports Southwest appearance that I could see Tech going from 4-8 to 8-4 this season. I still think that's a possibility. Patrick Mahomes seems to give Tech a chance in almost every game. I'm very interested in how Tech does at Oklahoma in two weeks. Obviously, injuries could change everything but you easily make a case than Tech is certainly in the top half of the Big 12. Two other key games to circle for Tech: Oklahoma State visits Lubbock on Halloween and the Thanksgiving trip to Austin.
Question: Did David Beatty really mention Patrick Mahomes in the same sentence as Johnny Manziel? What am I missing?
Carlton: Lots of coaches turn into Lou Holtz clones the week before games. That said, Mahomes is probably underrated as a play-making quarter. He's just not Manziel yet.
Click here to read the full chat transcript.
